It's okay, but is definitely not one of the top Vinegar Syndrome contenders.  Pretty Peaches 2 and 3 is much better if you're looking for pure porn.

Good early '80s adult-type genre, when there was still some semblance of a story line and at least a minimal attempt at acting. The cinematography, set designs, hair and clothes styles, and music rather dates these flicks, but what do you expect? The close-ups of the 'action' do not compare to today's related flicks, but then today's related flicks also don't have any story line or demonstrated acting abilities, just 'performance'. I guess that's the difference between yesteryear's actors/actresses vs. today's performers....

ok if you're into orgies.  that's what most of the scenes in both of these films are.  i will comment on the film transfer, though.  a lot of the "golden age" films are just cheap VHS to DVD transfers.  i have recently purchased a few of the Vinegar Syndrome films and find them to be of pristine quality.  crisp and clean.
This was better than most... thanks, bill

Mai Lin is a super under-rated actress that exploded during a time when the typical blonde blue eyed girl next door was the "It Girl"
to say she is forgotten and over-looked is the truth and a bit sad

Oriental Hawaii  is a classic from a time when quality was at a all time high
Cast include:
Danielle, Jade Wong, Jessie St James, John Leslie, Mai Lin, Rhonda Jo Petty

When retired Naval Officer (John Leslie) decides to spice up his boring life by taking in some borders, he gets a lot more than he bargained for...These two insatiable oriental sluts bring nothing but an insatiable sexual appetite, and proceed to turn his quiet domestic routine into a 24 hour lust-soaked orgy! Everybody in the family gets into the action, and all we can say is..."Mahalo..!"

The original dvd was put out in 2000 by Caballero Classic Digital and it's a terrible VHS-Rip to dvd it looks like a workprint
1/2 of  Caballero Classic releases are average at best
This version being Newly Restored In 2K From The 35mm Camera Negative and in Widescreen puts the old dvd to shame
Vinegar Syndrome impressed me beyond with there limited edition blu ray so I'm sure this double feature combo is high quality
I'm sure this combo set is a must have for collector's and fans alike
